title: Topic & Curriculum Generator
purpose: Provide a curriculum or learning plan for prerequisites and key concepts related to a paper or chosen topic.
functional_requirements: Decompose paper content into foundational topics or concepts.
Allow user to indicate known topics to tailor the curriculum.

components.name: Topic Extraction
components.description: Identifies the domain areas and subtopics from the text.

components.name: Curriculum Builder
components.description: Structures these topics into a learning sequence or modules.

components.name: Interactive Quiz Engine
components.description: Optionally generates questions for user knowledge checks.
